subject: Attn: Sir.
body:
Attn: Sir.
Morning to you and sorry for the late response, The United Nations has ordered BANK OF AMERICA to transfer a total sum of $4,500,000.00 Two Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars into your bank account. All the foreigners who are VICTIMS OF NIGERIAN SCAM will receive $4,500,000.00 Two Million Five Hundred US Dollars as COMPENSATION from the United Nations (UN),so therefore the UNITED NATIONS has agreed and appoint BANK OF AMERICA (BOA) to compensate all the Victims of Nigerian SCAMS, your name was among the list of names submitted to BANK OF AMERICA for immediate transfer of $4,500,000.00.
Please my dear, BANK OF AMERICA is ready to transfer the $4.5 Million US Dollars to your bank account, we BANK OF AMERICA require your banking details to enable us transfer the funds US$4.5 Million US Dollars into your account, kindly complete the TRANSFER REQUIREMENTS below for immediate release of the $4.5 Million US Dollars into your account.
TRANSFER REQUIREMENTS:-
1: Your First Name.......
2: Your Middle Name.......
3: Your Last Name.......
4: Your Complete Residential Address......
5: Your Home Telephone No.........
6: Your Cell Phone No........
7: Your Age........
8: Your Occupation.......
9: Your Bank Name.......
10: Your Bank Address.......
11: Your Bank Telephone No........
12: Your Bank Account No........
13: Your Bank Routing No........
14: Your Bank Swift Code No.......
*************************************************
so transfer charge is $50 once you send the fee today. so buy Apple card or steam wallet card
BANK OF AMERICA require you to complete the above requirements to enable us process and transfer the sum of US$4,500,000.00 Two Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars into your bank account, as soon as you complete the TRANSFER REQUIREMENTS above and send it to us,BANK OF AMERICA will process all the legal transfer documents and the sum of $4.5 Million US Dollars will be transfer direct into your bank account within the next 12/hours. All the transfer arrangements have been done, kindly complete the above transfer requirements and BANK OF AMERICA will CREDIT a total sum of $4,500,000.00 into your bank account within the next business day. we appreciate your immediate response to enable us complete this transaction, once again we apologize for the late response, kindly he;p BANK OF AMERICA to serve you better,have a nice day and Good morning.
Thanks.
Respectfully Yours.
Email;americabankof265@gmail.com
Mr.Lloyd Michael Eric
Director Online Banking Dept.
Bank of America.

subject: Re: Attn: Sir.
body:
Good morning Michael Eric,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this sounds like a very generous offer from the United Nations and Bank of Erica. However, I have a few questions before I can proceed with providing my banking details.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the United Nations decided to compensate victims of Nigerian scams? Is there a specific program or initiative that has been set up for this purpose?

2. What kind of legal transfer documents will be processed by Bank of Erica? Are there any fees or charges associated with these documents?

3. You mentioned purchasing Apple cards or steam wallet cards for the transfer charge. Could you please clarify why these specific cards are required and how they will be used in the process?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: Attn: Sir.
body:
Good days i received you email now thank you very much for you reply ok so
please try to send the fee $50 USD today to transfer you funds to you ok so
please Apple cards $50 USD ok

subject: Re: Attn: Sir.
body:
Hello there! Thank you for your email. I appreciate your prompt response. Just to clarify, you mentioned sending a fee in USD to transfer funds to me. Could you please provide more details about this fee? What is it for and how much is it? Additionally, you mentioned Apple cards. Could you explain how they are related to the transaction? I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: Attn: Sir.
body:
Good days Thelma i received you email now thank you very much for you reply
ok so the fee $50 USD only you have send now is transfer charge is only $50
USD it will cost you to transfer your funds into you bank account ok so so
please send the fee today buy Apple cards $50 USD only ok thank you i am
waiting to hear from you

subject: Re: Attn: Sir.
body:
Hello Thelma, thank you for your email. I appreciate your prompt response. Just to clarify, you mentioned that the fee to transfer my funds into my bank account is only USD? Could you please provide more details about this transfer charge? How exactly does it work? Also, you mentioned purchasing Apple cards - could you explain why I would need to do that? Thank you and looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Thelma

body:
